headline: GANNI LOVE FOREVER
bodyText: “Our FW21 collection is all about love. Our love for life, for music and all the things we took for granted. Music is my biggest source of inspiration. I miss the dance floor and the energy that music gives me. A song can be a way of encapsulating a moment and give you a feeling of hope in times that feel uncertain. And a reminder that whatever you are going through, it will be okay."– Ditte Reffstrup, Creative Director, GANNI
